Surprise Billing Protection Notice

extension.valueString:
Your Rights Under the No Surprises Act

You have the right to receive a Good Faith Estimate explaining how much your medical care will cost. You are protected from surprise billing for:

  • Emergency services, even if you get them out-of-network
  • Certain services from out-of-network providers at in-network facilities

If you believe you have been wrongly billed, you have the right to dispute the bill.

For more information visit: www.cms.gov/nosurprises
